entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
